# wrkshputils

<!-- badges: start -->
  [![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
<!-- badges: end -->

Workshop Utilities for R contains a few utilty functions for planning and conducting workshops. They include:

- create custom HTML report for a Google Form survey
- create HTML pages with hints and tips, with an option to created bitly links
